page.title: 08TRAFFIC IN FENISCOWLES
page.content: On the 14th May 1985, we did a traffic survey on Livesey Branch Road, on the edge of Feniscowles,Blackburn, from 9.40a.m. to 10.00a.m. On the side of the road with vehicles going to Feniscowles, there were 51 cars, 17 commercial vehicles, 1 bus and no bikes. Coming from Feniscowles there were 34 cars, 18 commercial vehicles, l bus and no bikes. We thought there would be more vehicles at this time of the morning because there would be some people going to work and some doing early morning exercise on their bikes. The total number of vehicles that passed us was 122. There were 69 going to Feniscowles and 53 coming from Feniscowles. We think that there were more vehicles going to Feniscowles because of the industrial units there.
